channel.title: Powering on Exhaust causes crash
channel.description: I used installer to install the game so everything is in the right folders and such. Game didn't have a single crash until powering on the exhaust to defeat the blind "boss" that smashes based on sound. Works for a few seconds after turning exhaust on and then game crashes as if it is trying to start a sound or animation that isn't there. Not sure if anyone has ran into this issue yet but as of right now I can't continue the game until the issue is fixed somehow.

item.title: Powering on Exhaust causes crash
item.dc:creator: jmawy
item.description:
Never mind kill zombie and smash all skids and boxes.

Read full topic

item.title: Powering on Exhaust causes crash
item.dc:creator: jmawy
item.description:
I used installer to install the game so everything is in the right folders and such. Game didn’t have a single crash until powering on the exhaust to defeat the blind “boss” that smashes based on sound. Works for a few seconds after turning exhaust on and then game crashes as if it is trying to start a sound or animation that isn’t there. Not sure if anyone has ran into this issue yet but as of right now I can’t continue the game until the issue is fixed somehow.
